title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Learn How Sky Powers the Future of Streaming with Redis Cloud (API209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 了解 Sky 如何利用 Redis Cloud 驱动流媒体的未来 (API209)
abstract: When Sky streamed to 23 million viewers during the Peacock-exclusive NFL Wild Card game, bookmarking ensured a seamless experience, handling up to 140,000+ writes per second during live events and 116,000 during record-breaking moments. To meet these demands, Redis Cloud delivered: cross-region active-active replication for global sync, sub-millisecond latency for spikes, and intelligent auto-scaling. Its write-behind capabilities cut costs and enabled a long-awaited AWS Keyspaces migration. Now, Sky’s GenAI platform, Genapi, leverages Redis Cloud's vector search and semantic caching to transform content discovery. Redis Cloud isn’t just solving scale, it’s powering Sky’s AI-driven future. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当Sky在Peacock独家NFL外卡赛期间向2300万观众进行流媒体直播时,书签功能确保了无缝体验,在直播活动期间处理高达每秒140,000次以上的写入操作,在破纪录时刻处理116,000次写入。为满足这些需求,Redis Cloud提供了:跨区域主-主复制实现全球同步、亚毫秒级延迟应对峰值流量,以及智能自动扩展。其write-behind功能降低了成本,并实现了期待已久的AWS Keyspaces迁移。现在,Sky的GenAI平台Genapi利用Redis Cloud的向量搜索和语义缓存来转变内容发现方式。Redis Cloud不仅解决了规模问题,更在推动Sky的AI驱动未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Redis提供支持。
